SEARCH
Package antcolony.entities

Class LeafPhysics

java.lang.Object
antcolony.entities.LeafPhysics
public class LeafPhysics extends Object
Realistic physics engine for light objects (leaves).

Unlike the ant physics (which is based on behavior/steering), this class uses classic Newtonian simulation: Forces (Gravity + Drag + Wind) -> Acceleration -> Velocity -> Position.

The system converts between world units (Pixels) and the International System (Meters/kg) to calculate air resistance correctly.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(processing.core.PApplet p, float dt, float groundYpx, float minXpx, float maxXpx)
      Updates the physical simulation for a time step (dt).
      Parameters:
      p - Reference to PApplet.
      dt - Delta time (time elapsed since the last frame in seconds).
      groundYpx - Y position of the ground in pixels.
      minXpx - Left boundary in pixels.
      maxXpx - Right boundary in pixels.
